description: Given a linked list of words (strings), reverse the order of words that share the same vowel count, grouping consecutive words with equal vowel counts and reversing each such group in-place within the list.

examples.explanation: "ab" and "cd" both have 1 vowel, so they are reversed. "ae" and "boo" each have 2 vowels, so they are reversed.

constraints: Words consist of lowercase English letters
